snippet: Ports were shut across the Philippines, leaving thousands of travelers stranded, and some local governments ordered evacuations on Friday as Typhoon Hagupit swept toward the country’s east.
abstract: Typhoon Hagupit moves toward the Philippines, forcing port closures and stranding thousands of travelers; some local governments order evacuations.
lead_paragraph: Ports were shut across the Philippines, leaving thousands of travelers stranded, and some local governments ordered evacuations on Friday as Typhoon Hagupit swept toward the country’s east.

headline.main: Philippines: Travelers Stranded by Precautions for Typhoon
headline.print_headline: Philippines: Travelers Stranded by Precautions for Typhoon
